Package com.casino.games.slotgames

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Game
    Interface for defining a game
    RandomStrategy
    Interface for defining a strategy for generating random numbers
    Statistics
    Interface for defining the statistics of a game.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGame
    Abstract class used as a super class of a game.
    AbstractGameStatistics
    Abstract class used as a super class of statistics.
    BonusGameApp
    Main class for running bonus games as an application
    BonusGameImpl
    Implementation of the Bonus Game.
    BonusGameStats
    Class used for collecting statistics for the bonus game.
    BonusGameTest
    JUnit test class for testing the BonusGameTest class.
    GameApp
    Main class for running games as an application
    RandomGaussian
    Class for generating random numbers using the uniform Gaussian distribution Not a good distribution for this purpose since it does not pass the Marsaglia’s Diehard Battery of Tests of Randomness
    RandomMersenneTwister
    Class for generating 32-bit random numbers using the Random Mersenne Twister pseudo-random number generator.
    RandomMersenneTwister64
    Class for generating 64-bit random numbers using the Random Mersenne Twister pseudo-random number generator.
    SlotGameApp
    Main class for running slot games as an application
    SlotGameImpl
    Implementation of the Slot Game.
    SlotGameStats
    Class used for collecting statistics for the slot game.
    SlotGameTest
    JUnit test class for testing the SlotGameTest class.
    StatisticAttribute
    Defines a statistic attribute
